reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 131/08: EXEMPTION FROM NEW INVESTMENT RULES

content.content: 1. In this Regulation, “new investment rules” has the meaning assigned by subsection 431.1 (1) of the Act; (“nouvelles règles de placement”) “old investment rules” has the meaning assigned by subsection 431.1 (1) of the Act. (“anciennes règles de placement”) O. Reg. 131/08, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. In this Regulation,

“new investment rules” has the meaning assigned by subsection 431.1 (1) of the Act; (“nouvelles règles de placement”)

“old investment rules” has the meaning assigned by subsection 431.1 (1) of the Act. (“anciennes règles de placement”) O. Reg. 131/08, s. 1.

content.content: 2. (1) The TTC Insurance Company Limited is exempt from the application of the new investment rules, and the old investment rules shall continue to apply to it. O. Reg. 131/08, s. 2 (1). (2) Parts II.2 and XVII.1 of the Act do not apply to the TTC Insurance Company Limited. O. Reg. 131/08, s. 2 (2).
content.raw_html:
2. (1) The TTC Insurance Company Limited is exempt from the application of the new investment rules, and the old investment rules shall continue to apply to it. O. Reg. 131/08, s. 2 (1).

(2) Parts II.2 and XVII.1 of the Act do not apply to the TTC Insurance Company Limited. O. Reg. 131/08, s. 2 (2).

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 131/08, s. 3. Français
content.raw_html:
3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 131/08, s. 3.

Français
